template.description: Dear Parent, (Function/Competition) will be held on (Date) at (Time) in college Premises. Kindly encourage your ward to be part of the (Function/Complete). Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parent, (summer/Winter) vacation starts from (Date) and reopens on (Reopen date). Thank You. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, (Date) will be holiday on occasion of (Reason for holiday). Thank You. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, Parents Meeting is going to be held on (Date) at (Time). Please attend without fail. Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, the results of (Mid Term/Annual Exams) will be announced on (Date) at (Time). Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, The (Mid Term/Annual Term) Exams will begin from (Start date) to (End date). Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, The (Unit test number) will begin from (Start date) to (End Date). Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, you are requested to pay the (First Term/Second Term) fee before (Date). Ignore if already paid. Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
Dear Parents, (Date) will be holiday due to (Reason). Thank you. From: NK PU College, Yadgir.
